div1.p:
United States Consulate
St. Paul de Loanda
S.W.C. Africa

L. de R. du Verge
to Depart. Of State
Washington D.C.

Subject
Nomination of Actg U.S. Vice Consul Wm S. Bent

Encloses
Despatch of same and his signature

opener.dateline:
United States Consulate
St Paul de Loanda
June 23d 1882

div1.p:
The Hon J.C. Bancroft Davis
Asst Sectry of State
Washington D.C.

Sir
I have the honor to state that Mr. William Stanley Bent was appointed by me this date Acting Vice United States Consul, until the return of United States Vice Consul Robert S. Newton, so that in case of my death the seal archives &a. of the United States would be in proper hands
div1.closer:
I have the honor to be
Sir
Your obedient servant L. de R. du Verge
U.S. Consul.
Wm S Bent
Sig.na of Wm S. Bent
Acting Vice U.S. Consul L. de R. du Verge
U.S. Consul
